alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 13 at 8:18PM CDT until July 19 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. For the Tennesse-Tombigbee River ...including Tibbee, Stennis Lock & Dam, Columbus, Macon...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Water surrounds sewage lagoon west of Macon; however, access road is not blocked. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 25.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 31.4 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Noxubee River Macon 28.0 25.7 Thu 8 pm CDT 31.6 32.4 31.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 900 AM CDT.
